articles.description: A major cryptocurrency business has halted customer withdrawals as it grapples with the fallout from the collapse of the $32 billion exchange FTX.Genesis Trading has barred redemptions in its lending division after facing “unprecedented market turmoil” in the…
articles.content:

articles.author: Seren Morris
articles.title: November train strike: When is it and which companies will be affected? - Evening Standard
articles.description: The strikes are part of an ongoing dispute between union members and train company bosses over pay amid the cost-of-living crisis.
articles.content: Members of the RMT union working at Network Rail and 14 train companies have voted for another six months of strikes, meaning more industrial action is likely unless a deal on pay, job security, and … [+3546 chars]
